chara.textHome:
I bought a new swimsuit since we were
going to the beach...

I tried to be bold and picked this one,
but now I'm feeling shy...

And this? It's a fishing rod.
I brought it because I'd like to try fishing.

I'd love to see the ocean during
the other seasons, too.
I'm sure it has a different feel to it.

I want to feel the seasons together
with Madoka.

I've modified my fishing rod
to make it easier to use.

I-I was able to catch one on my own!
It's my first time!
I'm getting used to handling a fishing rod.
Yah! Yah!
What do you think? Not bad, right?
Look!
This is the biggest fish I've caught yet!
Madoka said I have a knack for fishing...
I'm going to work hard and catch lots more!

Oh! But, uh, I haven't forgotten
about Witch hunting!
Is it time yet?
...Ack! Y-yes, I'm here!

Sorry, I'm just so excited that
I'm getting a bit anxious.
Let's have lots of fun at the beach!
Good morning!

I was so excited last night that I thought
I wouldn't fall asleep, so I went to bed early...
And now I'm up very early...
*Giggle*
I can't wait!
Why am I like this?
A bird even nabbed my lunch earlier...
Thankfully everyone shared theirs with me.

I can't help but think "another day is over"
when I watch the sunset.

I need to push myself so we can have
lots of peaceful days like this one...
I've never used handheld fireworks before.
There are sparklers too, aren't there?
They look so nice on TV.
I've always wanted to try them!

Looks like there's a sunflower field
quite close by.

If we get tired of swimming,
could we go there?
They should be in full bloom!

We can't go neglecting our Magical Girl
duties just because we're having
so much fun.
Let's go on patrol soon!
That copy of me is wearing a swimsuit too!
Gosh, it's kind of flashy...

N-now that I see it,
it's a little embarrassing...
This sandcastle is really incredible.
It's so detailed!

I know I only helped a little,
but I'm glad we could build it together.
C-c-cooold! Brain...freeze!

It really feels like your brain freezes
when you eat shaved ice.
*Giggle*
The grape one tastes amazing though!
Oh, this?
It's sea glass.

Glass fragments that drift in the sea,
become weathered, and end up
looking like frosted glass.
Each one is unique and pretty.
I made this wind chime.

I made all of it at a glasswork class,
from blowing the glass to painting it...

It sounds special to me,
maybe because I made it.
Eek! A-ah, were you watching me?!

When I twirl, the ribbons follow me,
and it's fun so...I...was spinning.

I heard Mami and Kyoko went
swimsuit shopping together.

I wish I could go too...
Maybe next year?

If there is a next year,
I want to go shopping with everyone.
Sayaka's swimsuit looks amazing.
She looks like a cool summer girl!
I could never pull that off...
I really admire her.

Madoka complimented my swimsuit,
but...I think she looks way,
way cuter in hers!

*Sniff* S-sorry, I'm not sad...
These are happy tears.

I never thought...
I'd have such a fun, lovely day...
Such a wonderful, normal day...
I WILL catch a big one!

I thought the fish might
just take the bait and go.
I won't let the heat bring me down!
Now I can fish in peace!
I caught a huge one! And I didn't get hurt!
Um... Do I look silly?

I picked out this swimsuit because
I'm going to the beach with Madoka
and all our friends...
Fewer fish are stealing my bait now!
I've leveled up, in a way.
I'm getting used to reeling fish in.
I feel like I can catch anything!

People like to tell scary stories
in the summer...
Ohh... I hate getting scared...

Swimming in the ocean is fun,
but so is just watching the scenery.
Ocean and sky, as far as the eye can see...
I feel like I'm in another world.

See where the ocean meets the sky?
It's kinda neat.

They're both blue, but you can tell
distinctly which is which.

This part is the ocean,
and that part is the sky.
